headline: Beware
pros: Absolutely none -- I can't think of one.
cons: Employees -- all were set in their ways, Not willing to accept ideas to improve.

headline: Had A Good Run
pros: Excellent place to work and go to school at the same time; very flexible and respectful of work/life balance.  Recommended.
cons: Company closed in 2010, so job opportunities going forward will be ... non-existent ... which is a shame, since it was a good firm and a good group.
